testcase.name: GET /status - 服务状态接口

failure.message: HTTP请求异常: HTTPConnectionPool(host='localhost', port=8080): Max retries exceeded with url: /status (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.connection.HTTPConnection object at 0x0000024C5F7B33D0>: Failed to establish a new connection: [WinError 10061] 由于目标计算机积极拒绝，无法连接。'))
